Subject: Email report configuration alert
Description:
Hi team, 
we need support to configure email report, because now for our report for "New Device Control Event -FILE COPY -Daily copy 500 files" we receive more than one report each time. Please give support to solve this issue. 

Thanks 
C.
What_We_Know__c:
The customer reported an inconsistency in the information inside the Transfer Limit alerts that are sent to their email address. For some of the alerts the username is displayed in the message body, but for others is missing. 
We had a remote session to better understand the issue.

We have suggested checking the Transfer Limit Alerts in the Server UI observe if the username is reported for those logs and checking if the alert matches the same format(with/without username)
Next_Steps__c: We are waiting for the customer to perform the checks.
Solution_Comment__c:
The customer reported an inconsistency in the information inside the Transfer Limit alerts that are sent to their email address. For some of the alerts the username is displayed in the message body, but for others is missing.
We had a remote session to better understand the issue.
We have suggested checking the Transfer Limit Alerts in the Server UI to observe if the username is reported for those logs and checking if the alert matches the same format(with/without username)
